options.name: Harmonic Theory
options.description: You understand the magical resonance within music. Gain +1 skill with magic knowledge. When you attempt to learn a new spell, roll an expression check; the highest dice is added to your spell check pool.

options.name: Melodic Memory
options.description: Your mind retains magical patterns through musical mnemonics. Gain +1 skill with logic and +1 spell capacity.

options.name: Perfect Tune
options.description: Your senses are magically attuned, granting you +1 skill with senses. When you have the alert condition, you roll a bonus dice when making senses checks with only sound.

options.name: Music Arcana
options.description: You have learned to enhance your musical performances with arcane power, allowing you to use, learn and compose magical songs and ballads. Learn one magical song of your choice with a difficulty of 6 or lower.

options.name: Daily Action : Power Ballad
options.description: You attempt to enhance a spell you know by channeling it as a ritual. To succeed, you must make an expression check using a musical skill that is 4 higher than the normal required check of the spell. On a failure, this spell cannot be channeled until a full rest is completed.

options.name: Reaction : Counter Verse
options.description: In response to a creature within a short (10 unit) distance using an ability that requires sound, you weave a silencing counter-melody. If they are channeling a spell, they roll their spell check with a penalty die (as if unable to speak). All allies within range become deafened by your harmony, protecting them from sonic attacks. You must be playing a song to use this ability.

options.name: Virtuoso
options.description: Your dedication to musical craft deepens. Gain +1 skill with expression. Choose one musical skill where you are Novice - become Expert. If you have no Novice skills, become Novice in two musical skills of your choice.

options.name: Enchanting Performance
options.description: Your music naturally bends minds and wills. Gain +1 skill with arcane magic. Your instrument or voice talent bonus dice can be used with spells from the enchantment school of magic. Additionally, enchantment spells that require a touch target can now target any creature who can hear your songs.

options.name: Magical Melody
options.description: When you are concentrating on a melody, you can channel spells by making expression checks with your voice/instrument instead of a check from the spell school. Channeling a spell in this way prolongs your song as if you had used an action to continue it. You cannot enhance a spell, or channel a spell that requires concentration using this method.

options.name: Songweaver
options.description: While you are concentrating on a song, you can channel a spell that requires concentration and maintain both at the same time. If your song is interrupted or you lose the ability to concentrate, the spell also ends. Concentration checks rolled while using the Songweaving trait are rolled with a penalty dice.
